segments.text: I am thinking about resigning from my current job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you thought about it seriously ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have been thinking about it for quite a while . Now I finally make up my mind to leave . I have given my resignation letter to our boss last Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , did you find a new company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will move on to XYZ Company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good for you , but your leaving will be a great loss to us . It is so nice to work with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . I had learned so much from you and our colleagues .
segments.speaker: S1
